evidence: Repository structure is organized by chapters and sections, suggesting educational or example-based organization rather than functional modules
Files are mostly standalone scripts with minimal interdependencies, indicated by low avg_fan_out (1.975)
Absence of packages (packages: 0) suggests lack of formal module hierarchy
Most files appear to be self-contained examples or demos focused on specific serialization or data handling tasks
No clear separation of concerns such as business logic, presentation, or data layers
Presence of proto files and generated code suggests example-driven content rather than production architecture
risks: Low reusability due to script-based nature
Limited scalability beyond example or educational use
Lack of architectural patterns may hinder maintainability in larger applications
